properties.name: onLoadMission
properties.description: Displays a message while the mission is loading. Note that a mission that takes very little time to load will only display the message for a short time. Care should be taken to see whether your message is readable in that timeframe.

properties.name: onLoadIntro
properties.description: Displays a message while the intro is loading.

properties.name: onLoadMissionTime
properties.description: Define whether you will see the time and date displayed while the mission loads. 1 means visible, 0 hidden. Default: 1. Effect unkown in Arma 3

properties.name: onLoadIntroTime
properties.description: Define whether you will see the time and date displayed while the intro loads. 1 means visible, 0 hidden. Default: 0

properties.name: loadScreen
properties.description: You can define a picture to be shown while the mission is loaded.

properties.name: briefingName
properties.description: Mission name displayed in the mission selection menu.

properties.name: CfgLoadingTexts
properties.description: Define mission specific  [loading texts](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Loading_Screens#Texts) .

properties.name: minScore
properties.description: Set minimum score for your mission. Score is related to the star display in the debriefing screen. The score can be influenced during a missions progress by using the  [addRating](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/addRating)  command.

properties.name: avgScore
properties.description: Set average score for your mission. Score is related to the star display in the debriefing screen. The score can be influenced during a missions progress by using the  [addRating](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/addRating)  command.

properties.name: maxScore
properties.description: Set maximum score for your mission. Score is related to the star display in the debriefing screen. The score can be influenced during a missions progress by using the  [addRating](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/addRating)  command.

properties.name: respawn
properties.description: Sets respawn type.

properties.name: enableTeamSwitch
properties.description: Enables or disables  [Team Switch](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Team_Switch)  functionality in MP when  [respawn](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#respawn)  type is 5 (SIDE). Default is 1.

properties.name: respawnButton
properties.description: Enable or disable the respawn button in the menu for INSTANT and BASE respawn types. Default is 1 (enabled).

properties.name: respawnDelay
properties.description: Set respawn delay in seconds.

properties.name: respawnVehicleDelay
properties.description: Set vehicle respawn delay in seconds.

properties.name: respawnDialog
properties.description: Show the scoreboard and respawn countdown timer for a player if he is killed with respawnType 3. Default is 1 (true).

properties.name: respawnOnStart
properties.description: 1 to respawn player when he joins the game. Available only for INSTANT and BASE respawn types.

properties.name: respawnTemplates
properties.description: Respawn templates from  [CfgRespawnTemplates](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Arma_3_Respawn#Respawn_Templates) . You can combine any number of them together.

properties.name: ReviveMode
properties.description: 0: disabled, 1: enabled, 2: controlled by player attributes

properties.name: ReviveUnconsciousStateMode
properties.description: 0: basic, 1: advanced, 2: realistic

properties.name: ReviveRequiredTrait
properties.description: 0: none, 1: medic trait is required

properties.name: ReviveRequiredItems
properties.description: 0: none, 1: medkit, 2: medkit or first aid kit

properties.name: ReviveRequiredItemsFakConsumed
properties.description: 0: first aid kit is not consumed upon revive, 1: first aid kit is consumed

properties.name: ReviveMedicSpeedMultiplier
properties.description: speed multiplier for revive performed by medic

properties.name: reviveDelay
properties.description: The time it takes to revive an incapacitated unit (default: 6 seconds). Having a Medikit will halve this time.

properties.name: reviveForceRespawnDelay
properties.description: The time it takes for an incapacitated unit to force their respawn (default: 3 seconds).

properties.name: reviveBleedOutDelay
properties.description: The time it takes for a unit to bleed out (default: 2 minutes).

properties.name: CfgCameraEffects
properties.description: Configure custom  [cameraEffect](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/cameraEffect)

properties.name: CfgSounds
properties.description: General sounds that can be used for dialog, voiceovers in the briefing etc.

properties.name: CfgSFX
properties.description: See  [CfgSFX](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/CfgSFX)  for more information.

properties.name: CfgRadio
properties.description: Radio sentences

properties.name: CfgIdentities
properties.description: Define the identities of individual units, you can specify the face, type of glasses worn, voice, tone of voice and name of an identity. You then give a specific unit this identity by using the command  [setIdentity](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/setIdentity)  in the mission.  :   is only valid for Arma 3.

properties.name: CfgFunctions
properties.description: Define functions for your mission. See  [Functions Library](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Functions)  for detailed info.

properties.name: CfgLeaflets
properties.description: Define leaflets for your missions. See  [Arma 3 Leaflets](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Arma_3_Leaflets)  for more information.

properties.name: CfgRemoteExecCommands
properties.description: Define commands available for remote execution with  [BIS_fnc_MP](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/BIS_fnc_MP) . See  [CfgRemoteExecCommands](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/CfgRemoteExecCommands)  for more info.

properties.name: CfgUnitInsignia
properties.description: Define custom unit insignia (shoulder patches).

properties.name: keys
properties.description: List of keys (needed for keysLimit)

properties.name: keysLimit
properties.description: Number of keys from the  [keys](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#keys)  list needed for unlock a mission.

properties.name: doneKeys
properties.description: Name of key(s) needed for mark a mission in SP missions list as completed.

properties.name: disabledAI
properties.description: When 1, removes all playable units which do not have a human player. When 0, a logging out player will have AI take control of his character. Default value is 0. (MP)

properties.name: aiKills
properties.description: Enables scorelist for AI players

properties.name: briefing
properties.description: Skip briefing screen for SP missions. If no briefing.html is present, it is skipped anyway.

properties.name: debriefing
properties.description: Defines if the debriefing is shown or not at the end of the mission.

properties.name: CfgDebriefing
properties.description: Define custom mission endings or override the default endings (found under CfgDebriefing in the game's config file).

properties.name: CfgDebriefingSections
properties.description: Define custom sections to be displayed on the debriefing screen. Useful for custom scoring systems or displaying player achievements.

properties.name: showHUD
properties.description: Enables/Disables the following IGUI elements:

properties.name: showGPS
properties.description: Enables/Disables the GPS

properties.name: showCompass
properties.description: Defines if the compass is visible.

properties.name: showMap
properties.description: Defines if the map is shown after the mission starts.

properties.name: showNotePad
properties.description: In ArmA, defines if the NotePad is shown after the mission starts.

properties.name: showPad
properties.description: Defines if the NotePad is shown after the mission starts. (Not in ArmA)

properties.name: showWatch
properties.description: Defines if the watch is visible.

properties.name: showUAVFeed
properties.description: Enables/Disables the UAV Feed. Default: 1.

properties.name: showSquadRadar
properties.description: Defines if the Squad Radar is visible.

properties.name: scriptedPlayer
properties.description: When scripted player is enabled, game no longer shows "No player select" error message upon mission start when no player unit is present.

properties.name: rscTitles
properties.description: Defines custom UI  [displays](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Dialog_Control) .

properties.name: weapons
properties.description: Set weapons available to players during the briefing.

properties.name: magazines
properties.description: Set magazines available to players during the briefing.

properties.name: backpacks
properties.description: Set  [backpacks](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/ArmA_2_OA:_Backpacks)  available to players during the briefing.

properties.name: weaponPool
properties.description: Allows equipment transferred from one campaign mission to the next to be available during the briefing in the gear menu.

properties.name: allowSubordinatesTakeWeapons
properties.description: Allows subordinates (i.e., not leaders) to equip items defined in  [weapons](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#weapons) ,  [magazines](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#magazines)  and  [backpacks](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#backpacks) .

properties.name: titleParam%
properties.description: and  (% in title is replaced either by 1 or 2) are multiplayer options. These options are seen in the lobby of a multiplayer game. These options can be useful for setting time limits and score limits in such games as Capture the Flag and Death Matches. Other popular uses include accelerate time, setting the mission difficulty or switching the intro on/off.

properties.name: valuesParam%
properties.description: See  [titleParam%](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#titleParam.25)

properties.name: defValueParam%
properties.description: See  [titleParam%](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#titleParam.25)

properties.name: textsParam%
properties.description: See  [titleParam%](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#titleParam.25)

properties.name: params
properties.description: See  [Arma 3 Mission Parameters](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Arma_3_Mission_Parameters)

properties.name: header
properties.description: See  [Multiplayer Game Types](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Multiplayer_Game_Types)

properties.name: disableChannels
properties.description: Disable global, side, command and system chat. MOTD and admin say have exception and will show in global. Introduced in BETA 1.60.93398.

properties.name: enableItemsDropping
properties.description: Disable dropping items while swimming. Introduced in BETA 1.60.93965.

properties.name: onPauseScript
properties.description: Executes a custom .sqf script or function in  [scheduled environment](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Scheduler#Scheduled_Environment)  ( [execVM](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/execVM) ) when player brings up Game Pause screen (presses 'Esc' button).  [Display](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Display)  parameter of the resulting  [dialog](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/dialog)  is available via (  [select](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/select)  0) inside the script.

properties.name: onCheat
properties.description: Executes custom statement when player enters GETALLGEAR cheat (see:  [GETALLGEAR](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/ArmA:_Cheats#GETALLGEAR) ).

properties.name: onLoadName
properties.description: String (usually mission name) shown during  [mission loading](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Loading_Screens) . The string is shown in a slightly larger font above the loadScreen. For example:

properties.name: author
properties.description: Author of the mission. The default loading screen shows this string below the  [onLoadName](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#onLoadName)  in a smaller font prefixed by "by ".

properties.name: overviewPicture
properties.description: Path to image which will be displayed when the mission is highlighted on the mission selection screen. Image should be .paa format and in 2:1 aspect ratio â€“ ideally 1024x512 (Arma 3).

properties.name: overviewText
properties.description: Text to be displayed below the  [overviewPicture](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#overviewPicture)  on the mission selection screen when the mission is available to play.

properties.name: overviewTextLocked
properties.description: Text to be displayed below the  [overviewPicture](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#overviewPicture)  on the mission selection screen when the mission is locked from play.

properties.name: joinUnassigned
properties.description: By default a new player is not auto assigned a free playable slot in the mission lobby in Multiplayer. Set it to 0/false to make him auto assigned to the side with least players.

properties.name: skipLobby
properties.description: When enabled, joining player will join the mission bypassing role selection screen. The joinUnassigned param will be set to 1 automatically, so that player receives 1st available role from mission template. When leaving such mission, player will go straight back to server browser.

properties.name: allowFunctionsLog
properties.description: Allows functions to log to the RPT file. Set it to 1/true to allow RPT logging.

properties.name: enableDebugConsole
properties.description: Allows access to the  [Debug Console](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Mission_Editor:_Debug_Console_(Arma_3))  outside of the editor during normal gameplay

properties.name: corpseManagerMode
properties.description: Sets the mode for corpse removal manager.

properties.name: corpseLimit
properties.description: Corpse limit before which ( <= )  [corpseRemovalMaxTime](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#corpseRemovalMaxTime)  applies and after which ( > )  [corpseRemovalMinTime](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#corpseRemovalMinTime)  applies (see below).

properties.name: corpseRemovalMinTime
properties.description: Remove all bodies that have been dead longer than  when  [corpseLimit](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#corpseLimit)  is breached.

properties.name: corpseRemovalMaxTime
properties.description: Maximum time a corpse can remain on the ground if total number of corpses is equal or under  [corpseLimit](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#corpseLimit) .

properties.name: wreckManagerMode
properties.description: Sets the mode for wreck removal manager.

properties.name: wreckLimit
properties.description: Vehicle wreck limit before which ( <= )  [wreckRemovalMaxTime](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#wreckRemovalMaxTime)  applies and after which ( > )  [wreckRemovalMinTime](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#wreckRemovalMinTime)  applies (see below).

properties.name: wreckRemovalMinTime
properties.description: Remove all wrecks that have existed longer than  when  [wreckLimit](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#wreckLimit)  is breached.

properties.name: wreckRemovalMaxTime
properties.description: Maximum time a wreck can remain on the ground if total number of wrecks is equal or under  [wreckLimit](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/Description.ext#wreckLimit) .

properties.name: minPlayerDistance
properties.description: The minimum distance between corpse or wreck and nearest player before the corpse or wreck is allowed to be removed by the garbage collector.

properties.name: forceRotorLibSimulation
properties.description: Force enable or disable RotorLib.

properties.name: CfgDisabledCommands
properties.description: Disables certain script commands. See  [CfgDisabledCommands](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/CfgDisabledCommands)  for detailed info.

properties.name: saving
properties.description: Toggle saving.

properties.name: respawnWeaponsWest
properties.description: Set weapons which BLUFOR players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnMagazinesWest
properties.description: Set magazineswhich BLUFOR players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnWeaponsEast
properties.description: Set weapons which OPFOR players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnMagazinesEast
properties.description: Set magazineswhich OPFOR players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnWeaponsGuer
properties.description: Set weapons which Independent players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnMagazinesGuer
properties.description: Set magazineswhich Independent players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnWeaponsCiv
properties.description: Set weapons which Civilian players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: respawnMagazinesCiv
properties.description: Set magazineswhich Civilian players will receive upon respawn.  has to be defined as well.

properties.name: taskManagement_markers2D
properties.description: 0: do not use new 2D markers (default), 1: replace task markers with new 2D markers

properties.name: taskManagement_markers3D
properties.description: 0: do not use new 3D markers (default), 1: replace task waypoints with new 3D markers

properties.name: taskManagement_propagate
properties.description: 0: do not propagate (default), 1: propagate shared tasks to subordinates

properties.name: taskManagement_drawDist
properties.description: 3d marker draw distance in meters (default: 2000). within this range, unassigned tasks are drawn on screen.

properties.name: disableRandomization
properties.description: Disables randomization on certain objects, object types or object kinds in the mission.

properties.name: CfgVehicleTemplates
properties.description: This class is used to create vehicle templates used by the Vehicle Customization system

properties.name: CfgUnitTemplates
properties.description: This class is used to create units templates. For now, this is only used with the function  [BIS_fnc_unitHeadgear](https://community.bistudio.com/wiki/BIS_fnc_unitHeadgear)

properties.name: showGroupIndicator
properties.description: When set to 1, changes default GPS mini map into a radar like display that indicates group members relative position to the player

properties.name: CfgRemoteExec
properties.description: Define remoteExec restrictions.

properties.name: allowFunctionsRecompile
properties.description: As a security measure, functions are by default protected against rewriting during the mission. This restriction does not apply in missions previewed from the editor and in missions with the following attribute in Description.ext

properties.name: CfgTaskTypes
properties.description: Define Task types and their icons
